events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to a size issue and refund request.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! I’m Julia. Sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket size. I’m here to help with your refund.
Could you please confirm your order number and whether the jacket is unopened and in its original packaging?
My order number is 8792345. The jacket is unopened and still in its original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for confirming. I have processed your refund request. You will receive an email with return instructions shortly.
Great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help!
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please watch for the confirmation in your email shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not received any further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
